predicate.note: Frames file for 'screen' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: GMAC screened the card-member list for holders more than 30 years old with household incomes over $ 45,000 [*U*] who [*T*-54] had n't `` missed any payments , '' the Buick spokeswoman says [0] [*T*-1] .
example.arg: holders more than 30 years old with household incomes over $ 45,000 [*U*] who [*T*-54] had n't `` missed any payments

example.name: roll film!
example.text: The editor also says the new producer on the film, Bruce Baird, told editors [*-1] to screen the picture without telling stars Sylvester Stallone and Kurt Russell or Mr. Peters.
example.arg: without telling stars Sylvester Stallone and Kurt Russell or Mr. Peters

example.name: transitive
example.text: They insist that CFCs are damaging the earth 's stratospheric ozone layer , which [*T*-1] screens out some of the sun 's ultraviolet rays .
example.arg: [*T*-1] -> which -> the earth 's stratospheric ozone layer
some of the sun 's ultraviolet rays
